description._content: Image taken from: Title: "An Introduction to Geology, illustrative of the general structure of the earth; comprising the elements of the science, and an outline of the geology and mineral geography of England. The fifth edition considerably enlarged ... with new sections and cuts" Author: BAKEWELL, Robert - Geologist Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 725.f.28."
